Topic.Title: Can't set my date of birth.

Posts.EditableText: Hello, I've recently made this account and am trying to access the "Adult" category I've heard about. When I try to set my date of birth visually it all goes well giving a "Profile updated successfully" message. However when I refresh the page or enter it from a different tab it's back to being blank. Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.
Posts.HTML: Hello, I've recently made this account and am trying to access the "Adult" category I've heard about. When I try to set my date of birth visually it all goes well giving a "Profile updated successfully" message. However when I refresh the page or enter it from a different tab it's back to being blank. Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.

Posts.EditableText: After you set the date you need to log off and back on again to see the changes.
Posts.HTML: After you set the date you need to log off and back on again to see the changes.

Posts.EditableText: No problems. If you had searched the forums for this you would have found many answers for  similar  questions.
Posts.HTML: No problems. If you had searched the forums for this you would have found many answers for similar questions.
